# B9AutoCloseTab

[![VS Code Marketplace](https://img.shields.io/visual-studio-marketplace/v/b9software.vsx-auto-close-tab?style=flat-square&color=622D93&label=VS%20Code%20Marketplace)](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=b9software.vsx-auto-close-tab)
[![Open VSX](https://img.shields.io/open-vsx/v/b9software/vsx-auto-close-tab?style=flat-square&color=622D93&label=Open%20VSX)](https://open-vsx.org/extension/B9Software/vsx-auto-close-tab)

A lightweight VS Code extension that prevents tab overload by automatically closing the oldest tabs when you open too many.

## Tech Stack

- **TypeScript** - Main development language
- **pnpm** - Package management
- **esbuild** - Build tool

## Development Setup

1. Install dependencies:

   ```bash
   pnpm install
   ```

2. Run checks (linting, compilation, testing):

   ```bash
   pnpm check
   ```
